column4: Should rhythmbox be able to rip a cd directly to mp3 format? I have the codecs installed, but it's not an option under the preferred formats. However, when I click to edit the preferred formats, it's listed as an option. Any advice with this? Thanks in advance for your help.
not sure about your rhythmbox but Grip is a good GUI CD Ripper and abcde is the BEST cd ripper out there, but cli only.  good luck.
Will it rip straight to mp3?
